panel.title: NYC Uber rides, month over month, July - September 2014

search.query: | inputlookup rides-by-day.csv | eval _time = strptime(Date, "%d-%b-%y") | timechart sum(Uber) as "Uber Rides"

panel.title: NYC Uber rides, month over month, July - September 2014, with custom labels

search.query: | inputlookup rides-by-day.csv | eval _time = strptime(Date, "%d-%b-%y") | timechart sum(Uber) as "Uber Rides"

panel.title: NYC Uber rides, week over week, September 2014

search.query: | inputlookup rides-by-day.csv | where match(Date, "Sep") | eval _time = strptime(Date, "%d-%b-%y") | timechart sum(Uber) as "Uber Rides"

panel.title: NYC Uber rides, day over day, September 1-7 2014

search.query: | inputlookup rides-by-hour.csv | eval _time=strptime(Date_Time, "%D %R") | timechart span=1h sum(Rides) as "Uber Rides"

panel.title: NYC Uber rides, hour over hour, 6:00 - 11:00 September 1 2014

search.query: | inputlookup rides-by-minute.csv | eval _time=strptime(Date_Time, "%D %R") | timechart span=5m sum(Rides) as "Uber Rides"
